public class BlankValidatorMixin<W extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget & com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasValue<V> & com.google.gwt.editor.client.Editor<V>,V>

Mixin that provides the allowBlank functionality for input fields.
